newsitem.title: SRI LANKA: Sri Lanka stocks to rise on growth expectations.
newsitem.headline: Sri Lanka stocks to rise on growth expectations.

text.p: Sri Lanka stocks are expected to notch new gains on Thursday on the back of fundamentally sound counters which are expected to main their growth momentum, brokers said.
"There are about 25 to 30 stocks with good fundamentals, which are dominating the market," said a trader at brokerage John Keells.
On Wednesday, the all share index closed 6.8 points up at 805.3 on turnover of 98.5 million rupees.
